optionalInfo.fit:
Loose fit. 

Sia is 170cm tall and is wearing a size S. 

Length: 65 cm
Chest width: 53
optionalInfo.care:
Do not machine wash.
Clean with a wet towel or wash by hand very gently.
optionalInfo.production: This vintage jacket is hand painted painted with acrylic paint on the back, covered with a matte acrylic finisher which makes it water resistant. The jacket features Stephen Hawking surrounded by planets.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: This one of a kind jacket has a black colour, two pockets with buttons on the chest and two slit pockets on the front. The item has button details at the end of the sleeves and can be closed through buttons on the front. The item has a collar and is finished off with several destroyed details.
